channel.title: Adobe After Effects on Ankush Chadda
channel.description: Recent content in Adobe After Effects on Ankush Chadda

item.title: Video Editing and Animation
item.description: Animations Animations have always amazed me. Beautiful still images are brought to life, objects are set in motion, etc, all mainly depending how the animators imagined and implemented it, probably using a animation tool. While my wife was making illustrations (portfolio), I decided to try my hands on some animations using Adobe After Effects. You can check it out here Video Editing While this was fun, I also wanted to work on my Video Editing skills.
